Package com.atakmap.net

Class AtakCertificateDatabaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.net.AtakCertificateDatabaseAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtakCertificateDatabaseIFace, Disposable
    @ModifierApi(since="4.3",
             target="4.6",
             modifiers="final")
public final class AtakCertificateDatabaseAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements AtakCertificateDatabaseIFace
    Class responsible for the local calls similar to AtakCertificateDatabaseAdapter.

      • getCertificateForType

        public byte[] getCertificateForType​(java.lang.String type,
                                    boolean validateHash)
        Gets the certificate by the given type.
        Specified by:
        getCertificateForType in interface AtakCertificateDatabaseIFace
        Parameters:
        type - the certificate type.
        validateHash - If true, the certificate is validated against the stored hash. If the validation check fails, null is returned even if the certificate is in the database
        Returns:
        Null if not exists, the certificate as a byte[] otherwise.
